sourcesContent:
<template>
  <component :is="componentTag" class="n-badge" :class="`badge-${type}`" :href="href">
    <slot></slot>
  </component>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'badge',
    props: {
      tag: {
        type: String,
        default: 'span'
      },
      href: String,
      type: {
        type: String,
        default: 'default',
        validator: (value) => {
          let acceptedValues = ['primary', 'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger', 'default', 'neutral'];
          return acceptedValues.indexOf(value) !== -1
        }
      }
    },
    computed: {
      componentTag() {
        return this.href ? 'a' : this.tag;
      }
    }
  }
</script>
<style>
</style>
